item.charmofreturn.charm_of_return.desc: Hold right click to return home
jei_info.charmofreturn.charm_of_return: These charms are used to teleport the user to their spawn-point. By default, they can be found in end city chests and rarely in stronghold chests
config_screen.charmofreturn.title: Charm of Return Config
config_screen.charmofreturn.server.title: Server
config_screen.charmofreturn.server.gamep: This determines how much xp to take from the player when the charm is used. The variable 'x' is the player's current XP. This demo passes '%s' for x.
This is the amount of durability the charm has. Zero gives it unlimited uses.
This is the amount of time it takes to use the charm.
This is the amount of time that must go by to use the charm again.
Whether using the charm with a bound Respawn Anchor in the Nether will consume a charge.
If this is set to true, particles from other players using charms will not be sent to other clients. This is to prevent players from spamming particles at others.
